original_text: Mary Magdalene went to the disciples with the news: “I have seen the Lord!” And she told them that he had said these things to her.
korean_text: 막달라 마리아가 가서 제자들에게 내가 주를 보았다 하고 또 주께서 자기에게 이렇게 말씀하셨다 이르니라

sentences.original_text: Mary Magdalene went to the disciples
that he had said these things to her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그녀에게 이런 것들을 말했다는 것을.
